sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"收缩，压缩"之意。
means: condense ： 指将东西压缩得更紧密、紧凑，但不失去原有的内容。
compress ： 指把乱而不成形的东西压成一定形状。
contract ： 主要指以内、外部力量进行紧缩，也可用作引申。
shrink ： 侧重指因收缩而达不到原有的长度、体积或容积。

sentence.Network_en: Alistair saw Henry shrink, as if the words had touched a nerve.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿利斯泰尔看到亨利向后缩了一下，好像那些话触到了他的痛处。

sentence.Network_en: There was a general acceptance that the defence budget would shrink.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们普遍相信国防预算将会缩减。
我已经看过心理专家了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scrincan, of Germanic origin; related to Swedish skrynka 'to wrinkle'

encyclopedia.content: 心理医师 导演： 乔纳斯·帕特 主演： 凯文·史派西 马克·韦伯 可可·帕尔莫 杰克·哈斯顿 上映： 2009年7月24日 类型： 剧情片 地区： 美国 语言： 英语 一个位处在壁洛杉矶颇有名气的心理医芒生硼亨氦利·妇卡嵌特锛堅摹な访排晌髦袷物級，眼下堪称“生意兴隆”——在他工作计划中需要帮助的高级病人已然逐渐增多：包括一位已经过气的好莱坞女明星，一个滑稽的且有着严重强迫症迹象的经纪人，以及一位毫无安全感而言的畅销

entry.tran: (通常指布料、衣服等洗后)缩水，收缩，缩小，皱缩
entry.def: If cloth or clothing shrinks, it becomes smaller in size, usually as a result of being washed.

example.tran: 我所有的套头毛衣都缩水了。

entry.def: If something shrinks or something else shrinks it, it becomes smaller.

example.ex: The vast forests of West Africa have shrunk...
example.tran: 西非的大片森林面积已缩小了。

example.ex: Hungary may have to lower its hopes of shrinking its state sector.
example.tran: 匈牙利可能不得不降低其缩小国家军事管制区的期望。

entry.tran: (因害怕、震惊或厌恶)退缩，畏缩，避开
entry.def: If you shrink away from someone or something, you move away from them because you are frightened, shocked, or disgusted by them.

example.ex: One child shrinks away from me when I try to talk to him...
example.tran: 当我试图和一个孩子说话时，他避开了我。

example.ex: Siegfried cringed and shrank against the wall...
example.tran: 西格弗里德畏缩了，退避到墙根。

entry.def: If you do not shrink from a task or duty, you do it even though it is unpleasant or dangerous.

example.ex: We must not shrink from the legitimate use of force if we are to remain credible...
example.tran: 我们要想保持诚信可靠，就绝不能避忌武力的合法使用。
他们在危险面前没有退缩。
我已经看过心理专家了。

means.word_mean: 1. a physician who specializes in psychiatry
1. wither, especially with a loss of moisture;
2. draw back, as with fear or pain;

sentences.sentence: "she flinched when they showed the slaughtering of the calf"

means.word_mean: 5. decrease in size, range, or extent;

Sentence.sentence: Its purpose is to build and maintain bone and muscle mass, both of which shrink with age.
com, predicts that the recession will shrink America's economy by

But at a time when the American factory seems to be a shrinking presence, and when good manufacturing jobs have vanished, perhaps never to return, there is something deeply troubling about this dilution of American craftsmanship.

Manufacturing's shrinking presence undoubtedly helps explain the decline in craftsmanship, if only because many of the nation's assembly line workers were skilled in craft work, if not on the job then in their spare time
They have stagnant (萧条的) or shrinking markets for goods and services.

means.word_mean: 收缩; （使）缩水, 收缩, 缩小, 皱缩

sentences.en: The number of students of this school has shrunk.
sentences.cn: 这所学校的学生人数在减少。

sentences.en: Washing wool in hot water will shrink it.
sentences.cn: 在热水中洗毛织品会使其缩水。

sentences.en: Will this soap shrink woolen clothes?
sentences.cn: 这种肥皂会使毛织品缩水吗?

jushi.english: The jeans will shrink in the wash.
jushi.chinese: 那些牛仔裤洗过以后会缩水。

jushi.english: Washing wool in hot water will make it shrink.
jushi.chinese: 在热水中洗羊毛会使羊毛收缩。
